item.title: Owen Portfolio
item.description:
Introduction

Hello, My name is Owen Stanclift.

I’m a Game Programmer that specializes in multiple fields. The fields I have a lot of experience in are Gameplay, AI, and Networking.

Below me are games/projects I have worked on over the years.

___

Skills

Engines: Unreal Engine 5, Unity, Visual Studio Languages: C++, C#, Java, C(Small bits)
